entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
